languages.text: {n}Сам же незнакомец держится с аристократической вальяжностью. Поигрывая пуговицей камзола и время от времени загадочно улыбаясь своим мыслям, он с видимым наслаждением затягивается душистым лхо.{/n}

{n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сам же незнакомец держится с аристократической вальяжностью. Поигрывая пуговицей камзола и время от времени загадочно улыбаясь своим мыслям, он с видимым наслаждением затягивается душистым лхо.{/n}

{n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那位陌生人散发着贵族的高雅气质。他怡然自得地吸着香气扑鼻的麻烟，手指闲适地把玩着外套上的纽扣，时不时对自己脑中的想法露出神秘的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那位陌生人散发着贵族的高雅气质。他怡然自得地吸着香气扑鼻的麻烟，手指闲适地把玩着外套上的纽扣，时不时对自己脑中的想法露出神秘的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}見知らぬ男は貴族のような尊大さを漂わせていた。彼は芳しいアイホを口に含み、指先でジャケットのボタンを無造作に弄りながら、時折考え込みながら不気味な笑みを浮かべていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}見知らぬ男は貴族のような尊大さを漂わせていた。彼は芳しいアイホを口に含み、指先でジャケットのボタンを無造作に弄りながら、時折考え込みながら不気味な笑みを浮かべていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El desconocido desprende altivez aristocrática. Da una calada tras otra a su aromático lho mientras juguetea con un botón de su chaqueta. Ocasionalmente, sonríe enigmáticamente como si se le hubiera ocurrido algo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El desconocido desprende altivez aristocrática. Da una calada tras otra a su aromático lho mientras juguetea con un botón de su chaqueta. Ocasionalmente, sonríe enigmáticamente como si se le hubiera ocurrido algo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'inconnu dégage une prétention aristocratique. Il fume son lho parfumé avec un enthousiasme évident, ses doigts jouent négligemment avec un bouton de sa veste, et il sourit ponctuellement de façon énigmatique à ses propres pensées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inconnu dégage une prétention aristocratique. Il fume son lho parfumé avec un enthousiasme évident, ses doigts jouent négligemment avec un bouton de sa veste, et il sourit ponctuellement de façon énigmatique à ses propres pensées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Fremde hat die Ausstrahlung eines Adligen. Er nimmt mit sichtlichem Genuss einen Zug von seiner wohlriechenden Lho-Zigarette, spielt mit den Fingern an einem Knopf seiner Jacke und lächelt immer wieder rätselhaft über seine eigenen Gedanken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Fremde hat die Ausstrahlung eines Adligen. Er nimmt mit sichtlichem Genuss einen Zug von seiner wohlriechenden Lho-Zigarette, spielt mit den Fingern an einem Knopf seiner Jacke und lächelt immer wieder rätselhaft über seine eigenen Gedanken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yabancı, aristokratımsı bir hava yayıyor. Aromalı aromalı kokan lihodan büyük bir hazla nefesler alıyor, parmaklarıyla ceketinin bir düğmesiyle tembel tembel oynuyor ve arada sırada kendi kafasındaki düşüncelere esrarlı esrarlı gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stranger exudes aristocratic hauteur. He takes drags of the fragrant lho with visible gusto, his fingers idly playing with a button on his jacket and from time to time smiling enigmatically at his own thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yabancı, aristokratımsı bir hava yayıyor. Büyük haz aldığı belli bir şekilde, aromalı aromalı kokan lihodan nefesler alıyor, parmaklarıyla ceketinin bir düğmesiyle tembel tembel oynuyor ve arada sırada kendi kafasındaki düşüncelere esrarlı esrarlı gülümsüyor.{/n}
